definition: alcove/bay in a room/unit of length used for rooms, approx. 3.3 meters

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: I don't work in the open-plan office anymore.
sentences.chinese: 我不用再大开间办公室里工作了。

sentences.english: Using SAP2000 establish a large bay multi-ribbed composite wall isolation model.
sentences.chinese: 利用SAP2000建立大开间密肋复合板隔震模型。

sentences.english: It is a natural one because the width, it is also standard width of a room.
sentences.chinese: 因为是就一自然间的宽度而言，故又称开间。

sentences.english: Dacheng Dian ridge top nine, seven-room, the grand style.
sentences.chinese: 大成殿九脊顶，七开间，造型宏伟。

sentences.english: The interlayer displacement of end bay of the top story is maximal.
sentences.chinese: 顶层端部开间层间位移最大。

sentences.english: The machine room is rectangular with large space. It can be divided freely. The utilization rate is very high.
sentences.chinese: 机房为长方形大开间，可自由分割，利用率非常高。

definition: configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
one bedroom and one living room
the store front/the part of a house facing the street serving as a store
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
